about_the_game:
GamePlay

Enjoy a sensual story while completing tricky puzzles!
Connect the numbers sequentially, using all of the squares on the board
After completing a puzzle, you will unlock a sexy new image and the next part of the story!
Can you complete every puzzle and meet all of the girls?!

Story Background

There is an old house in the deep forest where strange things happen every night.
Each time someone enters that small, lonely cottage, they meet a different woman with a voluptuous figure.
Each man who visits finds himself lost in their embrace, unable to resist the urge to bed them.
What will happen there?

Characters

Hanako:

Hanako is the first woman you meet inside Strangers House.
She has a sweet demeanor but hides her sadistic side beneath it all as she enjoys men during their night of pleasure.

Ayano:

Ayano is very confident in herself and knows how to use her charm to lure men into submission for the night.
She enjoys teasing them before giving them what they truly desire- her body.

Yurisan:

Yurisan has innocent looking eyes. However, she hides a playful side that reveals in Strangers House.
She enjoys being submissive during sex but can switch roles effortlessly if needed.

Features

  • 20 sexy and erotic images of beautiful girls.
  • A fantastical erotic story with girls who have unique personalities.
  • You can skip the puzzles if you just want to enjoy the story. (Press Enter during a puzzle).
  • CG Gallery mode. (Click the left and right buttons next to the CG after completing a puzzle).

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains a large amount of extremely sexual content.
It may contain assault/non-consensual sex or BDSM content.
It may not be appropriate for all audiences.
Please make your own judgment before playing the game whether you meet the requirements for playing such games.
The story is purely fictional.
All characters appearing in this game are adults over 18 years old.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 or higher; SteamOS
  • Processor: 4GHz+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 or higher; SteamOS
  • Processor: 4GHz+
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
